<|ref|>equation<|/ref|><|det|>[[603, 736, 790, 826]]<|/det|>

\begin{aligned}
& \frac{a}{\sin A}=\frac{b}{\sin B}=\frac{c}{\sin C} \\
& a^{2}=b^{2}+c^{2}-2 b c \cos A \\
& \text { Area }=\frac{1}{2} a b \sin C
\end{aligned}
\]
